headline.main: U.S. Regulator Targets 'Influencer' Internet Ad Campaigns
headline.print_headline: U.S. Regulator Targets 'Influencer' Internet Ad Campaigns

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission’s settlement this week with Warner Bros Home Entertainment Inc highlighted the regulator’s increasing focus on internet advertising by so-called influencers or online personalities....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission’s settlement this week with Warner Bros Home Entertainment Inc highlighted the regulator’s increasing focus on internet advertising by so-called influencers or online personalities.

headline.main: Threat Made to African-American Museum in Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Threat Made to African-American Museum in Philadelphia

docs.snippet: Authorities are investigating a threatening letter sent to the African American Museum in Philadelphia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities are investigating a threatening letter sent to the African American Museum in Philadelphia.

headline.main: Ex-Kit Digital CEO Extradited From Colombia to Face U.S. Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-Kit Digital CEO Extradited From Colombia to Face U.S. Fraud Case

docs.snippet: The former chief executive of Kit Digital Inc was extradited on Thursday from Colombia to face U.S. charges that he engaged in a wide-ranging market manipulation and accounting fraud scheme at the now-bankrupt technology company, prosecutors said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former chief executive of Kit Digital Inc was extradited on Thursday from Colombia to face U.S. charges that he engaged in a wide-ranging market manipulation and accounting fraud scheme at the now-bankrupt technology company, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Former Afghan Spy Chief Says Letters Show Pakistan Supports Militants
headline.print_headline: Former Afghan Spy Chief Says Letters Show Pakistan Supports Militants

docs.snippet: The former head of Afghanistan's main intelligence agency released documents on Thursday which he said showed that Pakistani intelligence services helped leaders of the Taliban and the feared Haqqani network in 2014 and 2015....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former head of Afghanistan's main intelligence agency released documents on Thursday which he said showed that Pakistani intelligence services helped leaders of the Taliban and the feared Haqqani network in 2014 and 2015.

headline.print_headline: Pac-12 Parity Rooted in Quarterback Changes at Power Schools

headline.main: World Series Champ Royals in Limbo as Second Half Begins
headline.print_headline: World Series Champ Royals in Limbo as Second Half Begins

docs.snippet: The World Series champion Royals are stuck in no-man's land, close enough to contention to keep fighting yet far enough behind the race that going all-in at the trade deadline would be a fool's gambit....
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Series champion Royals are stuck in no-man's land, close enough to contention to keep fighting yet far enough behind the race that going all-in at the trade deadline would be a fool's gambit.

headline.main: Homespun Hippie or Backwoods Gucci? ‘Captain Fantastic’ Melds the Two

docs.snippet: The film offers a mash-up of ’70s castoffs and rustic staples with a giddy twist....

headline.main: Greece: Migrant Dies After Clashes at Camp
headline.print_headline: Greece: Migrant Dies After Clashes at Camp

docs.snippet: Police say an Afghan migrant has died and two others were injured following clashes at a camp near Athens, in the latest outbreak of violence involving migrants stranded in the European Union country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say an Afghan migrant has died and two others were injured following clashes at a camp near Athens, in the latest outbreak of violence involving migrants stranded in the European Union country.

headline.main: U.S. Senator Asks Tesla to Brief Committee on Autopilot Crash
headline.print_headline: U.S. Senator Asks Tesla to Brief Committee on Autopilot Crash

docs.snippet: The chairman of the U.S. Senate committee that oversees auto safety issues wrote Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk on Thursday, asking the automaker to brief the committee on a fatal May 7 crash involving its Autopilot software....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of the U.S. Senate committee that oversees auto safety issues wrote Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk on Thursday, asking the automaker to brief the committee on a fatal May 7 crash involving its Autopilot software.
